name: Only One Bullet
description:
ONLY ONE BULLET

You have one bullet that comes back to you when ever you kill an enemy.

The goal is just to get the highest score possible!

Compete against your friends and family and see who is the CHAMPION

CONTROLS:

A & D - Left and Right

Space - Jump ( The unly jump limit is the roof, use it how you want )

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Esc - Menu

Made for GMTK 2019 Game Jam
